content: Our total net revenues for the fourth quarter of fiscal 2022 were 13.5 million, compared to 15.4 million in the prior year period. GAAP net loss attributable to NETSOL for fiscal 2022 totaled 851,000 or $0.08 per diluted share compared to net income of 1.8 million or $0.15 per diluted share for fiscal 2021. Moving to our non-GAAP metrics, our non-GAAP adjusted EBITDA for the fourth quarter of fiscal 2022 totaled a negative 1.4 million or negative $0.12 per diluted share compared with non-GAAP adjusted EBITDA of 2.9 million or $0.26 per diluted share in the fourth quarter of last year. For the full fiscal year 2022 non-GAAP adjusted EBITDA totaled 1.8 million or $0.16 per diluted share, compared with 5.4 million or $0.47 per diluted share in fiscal 2021. Second, we have continued to focus on organic growth within the core business, subscription and support revenue reached $28.3 million of fiscal 2022 nearly 28% increase over the prior year, due in large part to a one-time catch up of $3.5 million on Daimler contract, with a $24 million plus run rate of recurring subscription and support revenue projected over the coming 12 months.
